translated: The Mansion on the Plane of the Gods
The Male Person’s Mansion🔽The Chapter with Pāyāsi
The Second Mansion of the Giver of Rest
Just as the sun in a cloudless sky
(This sutta should be elaborated according to the previous mansion.)
“It’s because of this kind of deed

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca me sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
translated: My radiance shines in all directions.”
The second mansion of the giver of rest is the fifth.
